member.name: IQuickActivate.GetContentExtent
member.summary: Gets the content extent of a control.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that contains size of the content extent.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_FAIL.

member.name: IQuickActivate.QuickActivate
member.param: A pointer to the structure containing information about the container.
A pointer to the structure filled in by the control to return information about the control to the container. The container calling this method must reserve memory for this structure.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_FAIL.

member.name: IQuickActivate.SetContentExtent
member.summary: Sets the content extent of a control.
member.param: The size of the content extent.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_FAIL.

member.name: IQuickActivate
member.summary: Enables controls and containers to avoid performance bottlenecks on loading controls. It combines the load-time or initialization-time handshaking between the control and its container into a single call.
